  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. Inner contents: 1 metal can, wrapped in plastic. Badly dented and leaking from the bottom. Placed in a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.

item.title: Report E-2024050349
item.description:
Report E-2024050349

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-18
  • City: GAINESVILLE
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG LOGISTICS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 17205
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank. During the course of the delivery, the connection between the hose and storage tank became compromised. This allowed approximately 50 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. Hepaco Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
